alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 7:03PM EDT until September 07 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in east central New York... Northern Bennington County in southern Vermont... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 703 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Salem, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arlington, Salem, Manchester, Dorset, Cambridge, Manchester Center, Sunderland, Sandgate, Peru, Beartown, Chiselville, Peru Town Center, Rexleigh, Barnumville, East Arlington, Eagleville, Anaquassacook, Freedleyville, West Rupert and Bromley Village. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
